itunes:title: Revisiting The Most Clicked-On Thing in My Newsletter | Katherine Spiers
itunes:author: Kristen Miglore, Katherine Spiers
itunes:summary: Today we're revisiting when food editor and Smart Mouth host Katherine Spiers joined Kristen for a Genius Session— they discussed mayo's (unsurprisingly) hot origin story, the absolute best cookies Katherine's ever eaten (and where to find them), and whether QR code menus are around to stay.
